00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_BASIC_CONFIG_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_BASIC_CONFIG_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 
00020 // This header implements separate compilation features as described in
00021 // http://www.boost.org/more/separate_compilation.html
00022 
00023 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00024 
00025 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC // defined in config system
00026 // we need to import/export our code only if the user has specifically
00027 // asked for it by defining either BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK if they want all boost
00028 // libraries to be dynamically linked, or BOOST_ARCHIVE_DYN_LINK
00029 // if they want just this one to be dynamically linked:
00030 #if defined(BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK) || defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_DYN_LINK)
00031 // export if this is our own source, otherwise import:
00032 #ifdef BOOST_ARCHIVE_SOURCE
00033 # define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL __declspec(dllexport)
00034 #else
00035 # define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL __declspec(dllimport)
00036 #endif  // BOOST_ARCHIVE_SOURCE
00037 #endif  // DYN_LINK
00038 #endif  // BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC
00039 //
00040 // if BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL isn't defined yet define it now:
00041 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL
00042 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_BASIC_CONFIG_HPP
